dc:title: Our Fall Appeal
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An appeal for financial help and a restatement of the Catholic Worker belief in personal responsibility for the poor over State responsibility.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 242 1955-11-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
